## How I Work

I believe in the **"Open Science"** model of consulting. You don't just get a PDF report; you get the assets, the code, and the documentation.

### 1. The Discovery Call (Free)
We meet for 30 minutes to discuss your research question or technical bottleneck. I will tell you honestly if I am the right fit.
*   *Outcome:* A clear "Go / No-Go" decision.

### 2. The Blueprint
I deliver a detailed scope of work. For VR projects, this includes a "grey-box" prototype video. For analysis, this includes a mock-up of the final report.
*   *Outcome:* You know exactly what you are paying for.

### 3. Execution & Handoff
I build the solution and then **train you** on how to use it. I provide commented code and video walkthroughs so your lab is not dependent on me forever.
*   *Outcome:* A sustainable tool for your research.
